titles.title: Congratulating North Central College on winning the 2009 NCAA Division III men's cross country championship.
Congratulating North Central College on winning the 2009 NCAA Division III men's cross country championship.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and Labor.
Mr. Kildee moved to suspend the rules and agree to the resolution.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate on H. Res. 1001.

vote.text: On motion to suspend the rules and agree to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Higher Education, Lifelong Learning, and Competitiveness.

committee.name: House Education and the Workforce
committee.subcommittee: Higher Education and Workforce Development Subcomittee

bill.summary:
(This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary of that version is repeated here.)
Congratulates North Central College, Illinois, on winning the 2009 NCAA Division III men's cross country championship.
